title: Yuumi is ruining the game aain
body:
Another patch
Another stupid Yuumi bot lane combo that breaks the game
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-7svfEuyMc4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-7svfEuyMc4)

How long does Yuumi need to be a 40% win rate champ while at the same time being completely broken with the right combo before Riot takes away her permanent untargetability. 

It's time for RIOT to admit Yuumi is a failed experiment and nerf her into oblivion until she can be reworked.

Yuumi just happens to give the biggest AD buff in the game ~~and i really miss her old W~~.

As a Yuumi main with hundreds of games post patch 9.24 I think one of the most frustrating things is how useless q is and how long the cd on heal is esp now that it doesn't have 2 charges. With the high dmg meta Early game...even if you put all your points into heal you basically get 1 heal per engage, 1-2 heals for longer skirmishes, late game (3+ items) focusing on cdr this improves significantly. Yuumi has around a 37% overall win rate.

Half the shit Riot does these days is a failed experiment that breaks the game. But people still play it and buy stuff that costs more and more money for less and less value with each passing season, so it'll continue to be this way, design principles and balance philosophies be damned.
the other day i played mundo adc with yuumi and ended up smashing it... yuumi is such a nice pick with anything but an adc
lol just let her be unique ffs, what a turgid slice of the community to be anti anything even remotely capable of opening the meta.

What she provides isn't the issue, its the uninteractivity of it. There's no way to play around her.

GW is literally the only way to interact with her, and its not even direct. 

If her current design is to be salvaged at all, she has to do SOMETHING better while she's not attached or she needs to receive damage proportional to her host's received damage, or drain mana while attached.

> [{quoted}](name=WoonStruck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LexmvGHN,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2020-01-06T00:00:26.377+0000)
>
> What she provides isn't the issue, its the uninteractivity of it. There's no way to play around her.
> 
> GW is literally the only way to interact with her, and its not even direct. 
> 
> If her current design is to be salvaged at all, she has to do SOMETHING better while she's not attached or she needs to receive damage proportional to her host's received damage, or drain mana while attached.

She has extremely high mana costs for extremely low payouts though. Honestly speaking Yuumi is a _buff_ and not a champion; her goal isnt to support really. Its to empower someone already doing well to do _better_.  Thats kind of why she has such a low win rate... Shes the embodiment of the ardent meta. 

Her Q needs to be changed. With that, i think she'l fall into a good place. Turning it into a mark would help her tremendously i feel ; drop the base damage on it (give it 1 damage so it procs spell effects though...), and turn it into a mark that grants her carry attack speed AND procs other mark effects. 
With that, "yuumi counterplay" becomes "dodge the skillshot". Plus, her E wouldnt be overloaded to heck and back.
I also feel it could be interesting to make it so Yuumi can "miss" and mark terrain for a long duration. If she passes her projectile through the terrain it would refresh the duration of the projectile (and possibly turn it into an empowered version that slows again?). This could add even more counterplay by making the ability more complex, allowing you to predict and position accordingly.
